group.label: Header
group.comment:
IMPORTANT:
Width of the header columns is specified in grid units.
If you want to display three columns (Left Column, Central Column, Right Column) in a single row,
sum of these columns has to be equal 12 grid units, for example:
4 + 4 + 4, or 4 + 0 + 8, or 3 + 0 + 9, or 0 + 12 + 0.

field.label: Left Column
field.comment:
Specify value in grid units (between 2 and 12).
Important: Leave empty to remove this column.

field.label: Central Column
field.comment:
Specify value in grid units (between 2 and 12).
Important: Leave empty to remove this column.

field.label: Right Column
field.comment:
Specify value in grid units (between 2 and 12).
Important: Leave empty to remove this column.

field.label: Account Links
field.comment: Account Links block includes: 1. Magento's Top Links (links such as: Account, Wish List, Create an Account, Sign In etc.), 2. Additional optional custom links (content of built-in static block "block_header_top_links").

field.label: Include Top Links
field.comment: Disable to remove Top Links from the Account Links block.

field.label: Position of Additional Line Break
field.comment: E.g. add a line break after the cart drop-down to force other elements of the User Menu to be displayed in the new line (below the cart). Note that elements of the User Menu are aligned to the right edge of the header and are rendered in the following order: cart drop-down, "Compare" block, Top Links, custom static block.

field.label: Position
field.comment: Note that in order to display mini cart drop-down block, option Display Shopping Cart Sidebar under Stores > Configuration > Checkout > Shopping Cart Sidebar has to be enabled.

field.label: Sticky Header
field.comment: If enabled, the main menu does not disappear when the user scrolls down the page.

field.label: Full Width Sticky Header
field.comment: If set to "Yes", content of the sticky header will be stretched to full width.

field.label: Show Logo in Sticky Header
field.comment: If set to "Yes", additional logo image will be displayed in the sticky header. Refer to the documentation for more details about the logo image.

field.label: Move Switchers Next To Logo
field.comment: If set to "Yes", language and currency switchers will be moved next to the logo (but only on small mobile devices - when browser viewport is narrower than 770 pixels) to make the header smaller.

field.label: Enable Alternative Image
field.comment: Enable alternative image feature. Show alternative image on mouse hover over the product image.

field.label: Select Alternative Image By Property
field.comment: Which property will be used to select the alternative image in the product image gallery.

field.label: Alternative Image Property Value
field.comment:
Specify the value of the property which will mark the alternative image in the image gallery of each product.
For example: if the Select Alternative Image By Property field is set to "Sort Order", enter a number which indicates position of an image in the gallery - if you enter 2, then the second image in each product will be used as the alternative image.

field.label: Role Attribute Code
field.comment: Specify the code (identifier) of the role attribute which will mark the alternative image in the gallery of each product. It has to be an attribute of "Media Image" type. For example, you can create attribute alt_image (instructions can be found in the user guide), add the attribute to your products, then enter alt_image in this field and save the config.

field.label: Image Width
field.comment: Maximum width of the product image. If width is not specified, default width will be used (208 pixels). Remember that in the category view the visual size of the image depends on the number of columns. For example, if you increase the number of columns, columns will be narrower and there will be less space for the image in each column, so the visual size of the image will be smaller than the actual dimensions of the image.

field.label: Image Height
field.comment: Maximum height of the product image. To keep the original proportions of the image intact, leave this field empty. If this field is empty, height of the image will be calculated automatically based on width.

field.label: Number of Columns Above 1920 px (breakpoint 3XL)
field.comment:
Number of columns displayed if browser viewport width is greater than 1920 px.
The default value is 6.

field.label: Number of Columns Above 1680 px (breakpoint 2XL)
field.comment:
Number of columns displayed if browser viewport width is greater than 1680 px.
The default value is 6.

field.label: Number of Columns Above 1440 px (breakpoint XL)
field.comment:
Number of columns displayed if browser viewport width is greater than 1440 px.
The default value is 5.

field.label: Number of Columns Above 1200 px (breakpoint L)
field.comment:
Number of columns displayed if browser viewport width is greater than 1200 px.
The default value is 4.

field.label: Number of Columns Above 992 px (breakpoint M)
field.comment:
Number of columns displayed if browser viewport width is greater than 992 px.
The default value is 3.

field.label: Number of Columns Above 768 px (breakpoint S)
field.comment:
Number of columns displayed if browser viewport width is greater than 768 px.
The default value is 3.

field.label: Number of Columns Above 640 px (Breakpoint XS)
field.comment:
Number of columns displayed if browser viewport width is greater than 640 px.
The default value is 3.

field.label: Number of Columns Above 480 px (Breakpoint 2XS)
field.comment:
Number of columns displayed if browser viewport width is greater than 480 px.
The default value is 2.

field.label: Number of Columns Above 320 px (Breakpoint 3XS)
field.comment:
Number of columns displayed if browser viewport width is greater than 320 px. Below 320 px products are automatically displayed in a single column.
The default value is 2.

field.label: Equal Height of Grid Items (Products)
field.comment: If enabled, all grid items have the same height and "Add to cart" button is displayed at the bottom edge of the item.

field.label: Product Hover Effect
field.comment:
Emphasize the product on mouse hover over the product.
Important: enable in order to use "Display On Hover" in Display Selected Elements. Otherwise displaying elements on mouse hover over the product will not work properly.

field.label: Disable Hover Effect Below...
field.comment: Product Hover Effect will be disabled if width of the browser viewport is below selected value.

field.label: Hide "Add to" Links Below...
field.comment: "Add to wishlist" and "Add to compare" links will be hidden if width of the browser viewport is below selected value.

field.label: Align Center
field.comment: Align elements of the grid item to the center: product name, price, button etc.

field.label: Size of Elements
field.comment: Control the size of the elements of the grid item, such as: product name, price.

field.label: Display Name in Single Line
field.comment: If set to "Yes": if product name is too long to be displayed in a single line, it will be clipped and an ellipsis ('â€¦', U+2026 HORIZONTAL ELLIPSIS) will be appended at the end of the line to represent clipped text. This will only take effect if the option Name was set to "Display".

field.label: "Add to" Links
field.comment: "Add to wishlist" and "Add to compare" links. Note: value "Display On Hover" will be applied only if the option Show "Add to" Links as Icons Above the Image was enabled.

field.label: Show "Add to" Links as Icons Above the Image
field.comment: If set to "Yes", "Add to wishlist" and "Add to compare" links will be displayed as simple icons above the product image.

field.label: Image Width
field.comment:
Maximum width of the product image. If width is not specified, default width will be used (240 pixels).
Important: in the list mode the column with product images has a fixed width which equals 240 px. To increase the width of product images and exceed this fixed width you need to specify both dimensions in Image Width and Image Height fields. Otherwise, if you specify only the width, the column with images will never exceed the default width of 240 px.

field.label: Image Height
field.comment: Maximum height of the product image. To keep the original proportions of the image intact, leave this field empty. If this field is empty, height of the image will be calculated automatically based on width.

field.label: Product Hover Effect
field.comment: Effect is visible on mouse hover over the product.

group.label: Layered Navigation
group.comment: In this section you can find additional settings for Magento's layered navigation (the "Shopping Options" block which is displayed in the sidebar in category view). The basic settings for layered navigation can be found under Stores > Configuration > Catalog > Layered Navigation and Stores > Attributes > Products. All the details about the layered navigation can be found in Magento documentation.

field.label: Accordion Mode
field.comment: In the accordion mode only one filter can be expanded at the same time. If it's disabled, multiple filters can be expanded at the same time.

field.label: Filter Expanded On Load
field.comment: Specifies which filters should be expanded when the layered navigation gets initialized on page load. By default, all filters are collapsed.

field.label: Category Filter
field.comment: Set to "No" to remove the category filter from Magento's layered navigation (the "Shopping Options" block which is displayed in the sidebar in category view). You may want to remove the category filter if the sidebar menu (which also displays categories) was enabled for the category view.

group.label: Product Page
group.comment:
IMPORTANT:
Width of the product page columns is specified in grid units.
If you want to display three main columns (Image Column, Primary Column, Secondary Column) in a single row,
sum of these three columns has to be equal 12 grid units (for example: 4 + 5 + 3).

field.label: Image Column Width
field.comment: Specify value in grid units (between 2 and 12).

field.label: Primary Column Width
field.comment: Specify value in grid units (between 2 and 12).

field.label: Secondary Column Width
field.comment:
Specify value in grid units (between 2 and 12).
Important: Leave empty to remove this column.

field.label: Lower Primary Column Width
field.comment: Specify value in grid units (between 2 and 12).

field.label: Lower Secondary Column Width
field.comment:
Specify value in grid units (between 2 and 12).
Important: Leave empty to remove this column.

field.label: Collateral Data
field.comment: Container for product collateral data, such as: product description, product attributes, product reviews etc.

field.label: Position
field.comment: Position of collateral data container.

field.label: Display Collateral Data As...
field.comment:
- Tabs - display collateral data blocks as tabs (they will turn into accordion in mobile view)
- Accordion - display collateral data blocks as accordion
- Vertically stacked blocks - display collateral data blocks one below another

field.label: Opened Tab
field.comment: Specify index of the tab which should be opened on page load. Numbering of tabs starts at zero. For example, to open the first tab, enter 0, to open the second tab, enter 1. To keep the tabs collapsed on page load, leave this field empty.

field.label: Position
field.comment: Position of related products block.

field.label: Display As Thumbnails
field.comment: Display products as thumbnails: small image with name and price displayed at the side of the image.

field.label: Number of Columns (Breakpoints)
field.comment:
Products are displayed in columns. Specify the number of columns in a row visible with a particular browser viewport width. Use the following format (this is the default value):
[0, 1], [480, 2], [768, 1]
Leave empty to use the default value. More details about this parameter can be found in the user guide.
Important: if you display related products as thumbnails and place the block inside a narrow container (e.g. in Secondary Column), it's recommended to set this parameter to
[0, 1], [480, 2], [768, 1]

field.label: Number of Rows
field.comment: Specify the number of rows of products displayed in the slider. Enter value between 1 and 10.

field.label: Timeout
field.comment: To enable automatic scrolling of the slider, specify time (in milliseconds) between transitions. Leave empty to disable automatic scrolling. Note that 1000 miliseconds = 1 second.

field.label: Position
field.comment: Position of up-sell products block.

field.label: Display As Thumbnails
field.comment: Display products as thumbnails: small image with name and price displayed at the side of the image.

field.label: Number of Columns (Breakpoints)
field.comment:
Products are displayed in columns. Specify the number of columns in a row visible with a particular browser viewport width. Use the following format (this is the default value):
[0, 1], [320, 2], [480, 3], [992, 4], [1200, 5]
Leave empty to use the default value. More details about this parameter can be found in the user guide.
Important: if you display up-sell products as thumbnails and place the block inside a narrow container (e.g. in Secondary Column), it's recommended to set this parameter to
[0, 1], [480, 2], [768, 1]

field.label: Number of Rows
field.comment: Specify the number of rows of products displayed in the slider. Enter value between 1 and 10.

field.label: Timeout
field.comment: To enable automatic scrolling of the slider, specify time (in milliseconds) between transitions. Leave empty to disable automatic scrolling. Note that 1000 miliseconds = 1 second.

field.label: Position
field.comment: Position of brand logo block.

field.label: Magnifier
field.comment: If enabled, magnifier block will be displayed at the right side of the main image on product page to zoom the currently selected image. Magnifier block will be displayed on mouse hover over the image.

field.label: Magnifier Width
field.comment: Width of the magnifier block. Enter value in pixels, do not add "px" suffix.

field.label: Magnifier Height
field.comment: Height of the magnifier block. Enter value in pixels, do not add "px" suffix.

field.label: Show "New" Label
field.comment: If a product is marked as new, the "New" label will be displayed over the product.

field.label: Show "Sale" Label
field.comment: If a product is on sale, the "Sale" label will be displayed over the product.

field.label: Display Saved Amount
field.comment: If a product has a special price, the label will be displayed over the product to show the percentage which reflects the saved amount of money, for example: "-10%".

field.label: Precision of Saved Amount
field.comment: The saved amount of money will be rounded. Specify number of digits after the decimal point. Allowed values: between 0 and 4.

field.label: Show Custom Label
field.comment: If a product is marked with a custom attribute, a label will be displayed over the product. The values of the attribute will be displayed as a text on the label.

field.label: Custom Label Attribute Code
field.comment: Specify the code (identifier) of the attribute which will be used to create custom label. It should be an attribute of "Dropdown" type. For example, you can create attribute custom_label (instructions can be found in the user guide), add the attribute to your products, then enter custom_label in this field and save the config.

field.label: Footer Links
field.comment: Disable to remove Footer Links (links such as: Contact Us, Advanced Search, Orders and Returns etc.) from the footer.

group.label: Product Sliders
group.comment: This section is related to all existing product sliders. "Timeout" will be applied only to Featured Products Slider and New Products Slider. "Timeout" for Related Products and Up-Sell Products (blocks on product page) can be set in Product Page tab.

field.label: Timeout
field.comment: To enable automatic scrolling of the sliders, specify time (in milliseconds) between slide transitions. Leave empty to disable automatic scrolling. Note that 1000 miliseconds = 1 second.

field.label: Speed
field.comment: Duration (in milliseconds) of scrolling animation. Applied to scrolling with arrows (and touch swipe).

field.label: Automatic Scrolling Speed
field.comment: Duration (in milliseconds) of scrolling animation. Applied to automatic scrolling (if Timeout was specified) and to scrolling with pagination.

field.label: Pause on Hover
field.comment: If enabled, when the slider is mouseovered then the automatic scrolling will pause.

field.label: Loop
field.comment: If enabled, scrolling will loop.

field.label: Lazy Loading
field.comment: Delays loading of images. If enabled, images outside of viewport will not be loaded before user scrolls to them.

field.label: Keep Image Aspect Ratio
field.comment: Set "Yes", to keep aspect ratio of product images (height of each image will be calculated automatically based on width). If set to "No", Magento will automatically transform each image into square. If the original image was rectangular, the empty space at the sides will be filled with white color.

field.label: Import Static Blocks and Pages From Selected Demo
Import From Demo
field.comment:
Before importing, select the demo from which you want to import and then immediately save the configuration (click the "Save Config" button). Without saving, the option will remain unchanged after you refresh the admin page.
IMPORTANT:
in case you need the original content of some static blocks or pages
XML files with all static blocks and pages can be found in the following directory:
app/code/Infortis/Base/etc/importexport/cms/

field.label: Static Blocks
field.comment: Click this button to import static blocks.

field.label: Overwrite Existing Blocks
field.comment: If set to "Yes", imported blocks will overwrite existing blocks with the same identifiers (if any blocks with the same identifiers already exist). To change value of this field, save the configuration (without saving, the option will remain unchanged after you refresh the page).

field.label: Pages
field.comment: Click this button to import CMS pages.

field.label: Overwrite Existing Pages
field.comment: If set to "Yes", imported pages will overwrite existing pages with the same identifiers (if any pages with the same identifiers already exist). To change value of this field, save the configuration (without saving, the option will remain unchanged after you refresh the page).

group.label: Colors
group.comment: In this tab, you can configure basic colors. Settings from this tab are inherited by all the other sections. Some of the settings (such as text color) can be overridden in other sections.

field.label: Important Button - Active Background Color
field.comment: Selected emphasized buttons, e.g. "Add to cart" on product page, "Proceed to checkout" etc.

field.label: Important Button - Active Text Color
field.comment: Selected emphasized buttons, i.e. "Add to cart" on product page, "Proceed to checkout".

field.label: Interface Icons
field.comment: Selected interface icons, e.g.: slider arrows, category view toolbar icons.

field.label: Iconbox
field.comment: Icon with background color (icon with the "ib" class).

field.label: Iconbox (Social Icons)
field.comment: Iconbox wrapped inside a container with the "social-links" class.

field.label: Banners
field.comment: Banners with image, caption and hover effects.

field.label: Caption Color
field.comment: Background color of an element with the "cap" class inside a banner.

field.label: Horizontal Links
field.comment: Links inside an unordered list with the "links" class.

field.label: Additional Background Color
field.comment: It should be slightly darker or lighter than the main background color of the page. It will be used to emphasize some elements and blocks on the page, e.g. summary on cart page and checkout page.

group.label: Defined Fonts
group.comment:
In this section you can define fonts which will be used on the frontend of your store. Defined fonts will be available on a dropdown list in other sections of admin panel where you will be able to assign these fonts to selected sections of the frontend.
Important: when your configuration is ready, you need to save it (by clicking the Save Config button) in order to refresh the list of defined fonts.

field.label: Google Fonts Url
field.comment:
Enter the URL string with Google Fonts to define which fonts you want to use in your store. The URL string can be generated on Google Fonts website - see the instructions in the theme user guide for more details. For example, to request "Open Sans" (regular weight and bold), use the following URL:
https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Open+Sans:400,700
Note: requesting multiple fonts may make your pages slow to load.

field.label: Names of Local Fonts
field.comment: Specify name of custom local font which you want to use in your store. Font file need to be uploaded to proper folder (refer to the theme user guide for more details). Name of the font needs to match the name of the file. In case of multiple fonts, names need to be separated with semicolons.

field.label: Web Safe Font Stack
field.comment:
Specify web safe font stack, e.g.:
Arial, 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, sans-serif. Web safe fonts are fonts that are pre-installed by many operating systems. While not all systems have the same fonts installed, you can use a web safe font stack to choose several fonts that look similar. Font stack should hold several font names as a fallback system, to ensure maximum compatibility between browsers/operating systems. If the browser does not support the first font, it tries the next font. See this article for more details about web safe fonts.
Note: to provide multiple stacks, separate them with semicolons.

field.label: Body Font Family
field.comment: Select the default font family of the text on all pages.

field.label: Body Font Size
field.comment: Specify the default font size of the text on all pages. Font size of other elements will be calculated relative to this value.

field.label: Fallback Font Stack For Body Font
field.comment:
Specify web safe font stack for body font, e.g.:
Arial, 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, sans-serif. It will be used as a fallback for body font. E.g. if a font from Google Fonts was selected in the Body Font Family field and the web browser can't load that font (e.g. because of server failure), browser will use fonts from this stack. You should specify web safe fonts, see this article for more details about web safe fonts.

field.label: Headings Font Family
field.comment: Select the default font family of the headings.

field.label: Headings Font Weight
field.comment:
Specify the font weight of the headings. Use only numeric weights, e.g. normal weight is 400, bold is 700. Leave empty to use default weight.
Important: if you selected a font from Google Fonts, note that some fonts are not available in all weights.

field.label: Content Area Shadow
field.comment: If enabled, all sections with nontransparent Inner Background Color, will drop shadow.

field.label: Main Menu Shadow
field.comment: Select which container of the menu will drop shadow. Important: unlike other sections, menu doesn't need to have Inner Background Color to drop shadow.

field.label: Structural Elements Transition
field.comment: If enabled, main structural elements of the page layout will be animated during web browser window resizing.

field.label: Page Background Color
field.comment: Background color applied for all sections of the page: header, main content area and footer

field.label: Side Padding
field.comment: Add padding to the left and right side of inner container of all sections of the page. Specify value in pixels. Leave empty to use default value (15). Recommended value: not less than 15.

group.label: Header
group.comment: In this tab, you can configure the header section of the page located at the very top.

field.label: Top Padding
field.comment: Specify additional gap above the header section. Value in pixels.

field.label: Bottom Padding
field.comment: Specify additional gap below the header section. Value in pixels.

field.label: Top Padding
field.comment: Specify additional gap above this section of the header. Value in pixels.

field.label: Bottom Padding
field.comment: Specify additional gap below this section of the header. Value in pixels.

field.label: Top Padding
field.tooltip: Specify additional space at the top of the inner container of this section. Value in pixels.

field.label: Bottom Padding
field.tooltip: Specify additional space at the bottom of the inner container of this section. Value in pixels.

field.label: Side Padding
field.tooltip:
- Use Default - use the default side padding (defined in Page > Inner Container > Side Padding).
- No Side Padding - remove side padding.
- Full Width - stretch the inner container of this section to full width and use the default side padding.
- Full Width, No Side Padding - stretch the inner container of this section to full width and remove side padding.

field.label: Style of Elements
field.comment: Style of elements: drop-downs, account links, custom links.

field.label: Font Weight
field.comment: Make sure to specify weight which is available for selected font. Use only numeric weights, e.g. normal weight is 400, bold is 700. Leave empty to use default weight.

field.label: Line Height
field.comment: Minimum height of line of text. It works similar to CSS property line-height.

field.label: Top Padding
field.comment: Specify additional gap above this section of the header. Value in pixels.

field.label: Bottom Padding
field.comment: Specify additional gap below this section of the header. Value in pixels.

field.label: Top Padding
field.tooltip: Specify additional space at the top of the inner container of this section. Value in pixels.

field.label: Bottom Padding
field.tooltip: Specify additional space at the bottom of the inner container of this section. Value in pixels.

field.label: Side Padding
field.tooltip:
- Use Default - use the default side padding (defined in Page > Inner Container > Side Padding).
- No Side Padding - remove side padding.
- Full Width - stretch the inner container of this section to full width and use the default side padding.
- Full Width, No Side Padding - stretch the inner container of this section to full width and remove side padding.

field.label: Style of Elements
field.comment: Style of elements: mini cart drop-down, account links.

field.label: Font Weight
field.comment: Make sure to specify weight which is available for selected font. Use only numeric weights, e.g. normal weight is 400, bold is 700. Leave empty to use default weight.

field.label: Line Height
field.comment: Minimum height of line of text. It works similar to CSS property line-height.

field.label: Top Padding
field.comment: Specify additional gap above this section of the header. Value in pixels.

field.label: Bottom Padding
field.comment: Specify additional gap below this section of the header. Value in pixels.

field.label: Side Padding
field.tooltip:
- Use Default - use the default side padding (defined in Page > Inner Container > Side Padding).
- No Side Padding - remove side padding.
- Full Width - stretch the inner container of this section to full width and use the default side padding.
- Full Width, No Side Padding - stretch the inner container of this section to full width and remove side padding.

field.label: Mobile Header Tabs
field.comment: Tabs (i.e. Menu, Search, Account, Cart) displayed in mobile header.

field.label: Content of Mobile Header Tabs
field.comment: Content of tabs displayed in mobile header.

field.label: Mode
field.comment:
- Standard - search input is always visible
- Expanding - only the search button is visible, search input will slide out on mouse hover

field.label: Width
field.comment: Specify maximum width of the search box. Use values which are allowed for CSS property width. Example values: 200px, 75%, 10em

field.label: Border Radius
field.comment: Specify the border radius to make the corners of the search box rounded. Use values which are allowed for CSS property border-radius. E.g. for slightly rounded corners: 4px

field.label: Shadow
field.comment: Specify one or more shadow effects (as a comma-separated list) to add shadow to the search box. Use values which are allowed for CSS property box-shadow. E.g. for soft gray shadow inside the box: inset 0 1px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.075)

field.label: Shadow On Focus
field.comment: Specify one or more shadow effects (as a comma-separated list) to add shadow to the search box when search box has focus. Use values which are allowed for CSS property box-shadow. E.g. for soft blue shadow outside the box: 0 0 5px rgba(81,167,232,0.5)

field.label: All Drop-down Boxes
field.comment: Settings for all drop-down boxes inside header.

field.label: Dropdown Heading Filled With Background Color
field.comment: If set to "Yes", when the dropdown is opened, the heading of the dropdown will have a background color and will drop a shadow (the same as the content box of the dropdown). The color can be set in the Drop-down Background Color field. If set to "No", when the dropdown is opened, the heading of the dropdown will have no background color and will not drop any shadow.

field.label: Show Pointer
field.comment:
If set to "Yes", dropdown content box will have a small triangular pointer above the top edge.
Important: the pointer will not be visible if option Dropdown Heading Filled With Background Color was enabled.

field.label: Border Color
field.comment:
Add a border around the content box of the dropdown. If option Dropdown Heading Filled With Background Color was enabled, the heading of the dropdown will also have a border.
Note: leave empty if you don't want to add any border.

field.label: Mini Cart - General
field.comment: Settings only for mini cart drop-down box.

field.label: Show Text Label "Cart"
field.comment: If set to "No", label "Cart" in the mini cart drop-down will be hidden.

field.label: Mini Cart - Icon
field.comment: Settings only for mini cart drop-down box.

field.label: Icon
field.comment: Type of the icon.

field.label: Icon Size
field.comment: Font size of the icon. Enter value in pixels, do not add "px" suffix.

field.label: Iconbox Size
field.comment: Enable iconbox by selecting the size. When iconbox is enabled, the cart icon will be displayed inside a box with background color.

field.label: Iconbox Shape
field.comment: Shape of the iconbox.

field.label: Mini Cart - Product Counter
field.comment: Settings only for mini cart drop-down box.

field.label: Product Counter Size
field.comment: Size of the box showing number of products added to the cart. Default size: s.

field.label: Product Counter Shape
field.comment: Shape of the product counter.

field.label: Product Counter Position
field.comment: Position of the product counter.

field.label: Background Color
field.comment: Background color of the entire menu container, as wide as the widht of the browser viewport.

field.label: Top Padding
field.comment: Specify additional gap above the menu bar. Value in pixels.

field.label: Bottom Padding
field.comment: Specify additional gap below the menu bar. Value in pixels.

field.label: Inner Background Color (Outline)
field.comment:
Background color of the inner container. Set this color to display an outline around the menu bar.
Note: if no padding was enabled for the inner container, the outline will not be visible because menu bar will cover the inner container.

field.label: Top Padding
field.tooltip: Specify additional space at the top of the inner container of this section. Value in pixels.

field.label: Bottom Padding
field.tooltip: Specify additional space at the bottom of the inner container of this section. Value in pixels.

field.label: Side Padding
field.tooltip:
- Use Default - use the default side padding (defined in Page > Inner Container > Side Padding).
- No Side Padding - remove side padding.
